titles: Secret and family prayers with brief helps for the more devout receiving of the Lords-Supper And better observation of the Lords-day, as also to further the needfull duties of catechizing, visiting the sick, and personal instruction. Fitted for the use and benefit of the inhabitants of Cartmel in Lancashire.
author: Armstrong, John, 1634 or 5-1698.
publisher: printed by J. Hayes, for the author,
notes: Attributed in Wing to John Armstrong.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Family --  Prayer-books and devotions --  Early works to 1800.
